lasat bhūṣā bhūṣitam śakti saṃyutam

original: namaskṛtya tato devīṃ kuṇḍalīṃ saṃsmaredbudhaḥ // Dg_10.2 = DbhP_7,40.2 //
analyzed: namaskṛtya tatas devīm kuṇḍalīm saṃsmaret budhaḥ
prakāśamānām prathame prayāṇe pratiprayāṇe pi amṛtāyamānām
antar padavyām anusañcarantīm ānanda rūpām abalām prapadye

original: māṃ dhyāyedatha śaucāditriyāḥ sarvāḥ samāpayet // Dg_10.4 = DbhP_7,40.4 //
analyzed: mām dhyāyet atha śauca ādi triyāḥ sarvāḥ samāpayet
agnihotram tatas hūtvā mad prīti artham dvijottamaḥ

original: homānte svāsane sthitvā pūjāsaṅkalpamācaret // Dg_10.5 = DbhP_7,40.5 //
analyzed: homa ante sva āsane sthitvā pūjā saṅkalpam ācaret
bhūtaśuddhim purā kṛtvā mātṛkā nyāsam eva ca
hṛllekhā mātṛkā nyāsam nityam eva samācaret

original: mūlādhāre hakāraṃ ca hṛdaye ca rakārakam /
analyzed: mūlādhāre hakāram ca hṛdaye ca rakārakam

original: bhrūmadhye tadvadīkāraṃ hrīṅkāraṃ mastake nyaset // Dg_10.7 = DbhP_7,40.7 //

original: hṛdambhoje mama sthāne pañcapretāsane budhaḥ // Dg_10.9 = DbhP_7,40.9 //

original: ya evaṃ pūjayeddevīṃ śrīmadbhuvanasundarīm // Dg_10.30 = DbhP_7,40.30 //

analyzed: na abhaktāya pradātavyam na dhūrtāya ca durhṛde

analyzed: devāḥ ca muditāḥ sarve devī darśanataḥ bhavan
